pages.text: Use it to upgrade backpacks or drawers in smithing table. You don't need templates for this.$(br2)$(l:items/1_backpacks)Backpacks$(/l) increase 9 slots per upgrade, and can have at most 72 slot.$(br2)$(l:items/5_drawer)Drawer$(/l) capacity increases by 64 stacks (4096 items) per upgrade, can can have at most 512 stacks (32768 items).
